mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WOW_MEMBERINFO (ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, MEMBERTYPE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{membertype})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, DECODE(MEMBERTYPE,'seller','셀러','space','공간제공자','user','일반사용자') AS MEMBERTYPE FROM WOW_MEMBERINFO WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
SELECT SELLERNUM, ID, SELLERNAME, TEL, COMMENTS FROM WOW_SELLERINFO WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT PRODUCTNUM, SELLERNUM, ID, PRODUCTNAME, PROD_TYPE, KEYWORD FROM WOW_PRODUCTINFO WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT SPACENUM, ID, SPACENAME, SPACE_TYPE, KEYWORD, TEL, COMMENTS, SPACEADDR1, SPACEADDR2, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM WOW_SPACEINFO WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WOW_SPACEINFO (SPACENUM, ID, SPACENAME, SPACE_TYPE, KEYWORD, TEL, COMMENTS, SPACEADDR1, SPACEADDR2, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES (WOW_SPACENUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{spacename}, #{space_type}, #{keyword}, #{tel}, #{comments}, #{spaceaddr1}, #{spaceaddr2}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
INSERT INTO WOW_SELLERINFO (SELLERNUM, ID, SELLERNAME, TEL, COMMENTS) VALUES (WOW_SELLERNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{sellername}, #{tel}, #{comments})

INSERT INTO WOW_PRODUCTINFO (PRODUCTNUM, SELLERNUM, ID, PRODUCTNAME, PROD_TYPE, KEYWORD) VALUES (WOW_PRODUCTNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT SELLERNUM FROM WOW_SELLERINFO WHERE ID = #{id}), #{id}, #{productname}, #{prod_type}, #{keyword})
